title: Presenting Standard Triumph
brief_description: Survey of the Standard-Triumph motor car works, Describes the design, construction, assembly and testing of current range of automobiles. Advanced automation is used in the workshops including a Leo computer. Shows contribution of research teams to the development and design of new models.
